channel.title: Question about server status page!
channel.description: ok so i remember that the old status page had a place for hamachi servers. and now i cannot find it.. so obviously it is gone. is there a place that someone can tell me about that i can post my server on even though it has hamachi?.. because i can't post on mopar or runelocus cause it just says server is offline, you can't post. i know all of you are thinking i should just make a non ham server but i can't.. i have tried time after time and it seems the portforwarding part is what holds me back. i have memorized how to make a server, but have never successfully made one. no matter what tut i use. i think it is because i only have a lap top. once i get a hold of a new desktop i will try but for now i am pro-ham =P so if someone could help me that'd be great. thanks -Alex

item.title: Question about server status page!
item.dc:creator: @oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo
item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

i think the hamachi were taken out, but maybe check different sites…
hmm looks like your back to playing other people servers not your own

Read full topic

item.title: Question about server status page!
item.dc:creator: @FroobNess FroobNess
item.description:
@FroobNess wrote:

ok so i remember that the old status page had a place for hamachi servers. and now i cannot find it… so obviously it is gone. is there a place that someone can tell me about that i can post my server on even though it has hamachi?.. because i can’t post on mopar or runelocus cause it just says server is offline, you can’t post.
i know all of you are thinking i should just make a non ham server but i can’t… i have tried time after time and it seems the portforwarding part is what holds me back. i have memorized how to make a server, but have never successfully made one. no matter what tut i use. i think it is because i only have a lap top. once i get a hold of a new desktop i will try but for now i am pro-ham =P so if someone could help me that’d be great. thanks
-Alex
